original_text: After this I looked, and behold, another, like a leopard, with four wings of a bird on its back. And the beast had four heads, and dominion was given to it.
korean_text: 그 후에 내가 또 본즉 다른 짐승 곧 표범과 같은 것이 있는데 그 등에는 새의 날개 넷이 있고 그 짐승에게 또 머리 넷이 있으며 권세를 받았더라

sentences.original_text: with four wings of a bird on its back
sentences.korean_translation: 그 등에 새의 날개 넷을 가지고 있었다

sentences.original_text: And the beast had four heads
and dominion was given to it
